trans-unit.source: Provides a set of services for registering and unregistering managed assemblies for use from COM.
trans-unit.target: 提供了一套用于注册和注销的服务可供使用的程序集管理从 com。

trans-unit.source: Registration is needed when the objects within an assembly are being used by COM clients.
trans-unit.target: 当程序集内的对象正在使用的 COM 客户端时，需要注册。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GUID of the COM category that contains the managed classes.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含的托管的类的 COM 类别的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The GUID of the COM category that contains the managed classes.
trans-unit.target: 包含的托管的类 COM 类别的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the COM ProgID for a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 检索指定类型的 ProgID COM。

trans-unit.source: The type whose ProgID is being requested.
trans-unit.target: 正在请求其 ProgID 的类型。

trans-unit.source: The ProgID for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 指定类型的 ProgID。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a list of classes in an assembly that would be registered by a call to <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IRegistrationServices.RegisterAssembly*>.
trans-unit.target: 检索将通过<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IRegistrationServices.RegisterAssembly*>.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IRegistrationServices.RegisterAssembly*>调用注册的程序集中的类的列表

trans-unit.source: The assembly to search for classes.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的类的程序集。

trans-unit.source: A array containing a list of classes in assembly.
trans-unit.target: A数组，其中包含的类中的列表 assembly 。

trans-unit.source: Registers the classes in a managed assembly to enable creation from COM.
trans-unit.target: 在要能够从 COM 创建的托管程序集注册类

trans-unit.source: `RegisterAssembly` adds the appropriate registry entries for the types in the specified assembly.
trans-unit.target: `RegisterAssembly`在指定的程序集添加相应的注册表项的类型。

trans-unit.source: This method also calls any registration functions found in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还会调用程序集中找到的任何注册函数。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to get an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName>来获取程序集。</xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The assembly to be registered.
trans-unit.target: 要注册的程序集。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.AssemblyRegistrationFlags"></xref> value indicating any special settings needed when registering `assembly`.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.AssemblyRegistrationFlags"> </xref>值，该值指示在注册时所需的任何特殊设置`assembly`。

trans-unit.source: if assembly contains types that were successfully registered; otherwise if the assembly contains no eligible types.
trans-unit.target: 如果 assembly 包含类型成功注册; 否则为如果该程序集包含不符合条件的类型。

trans-unit.source: assembly is .
trans-unit.target: assemblyis .

trans-unit.source: The full name of assembly is .
trans-unit.target: The full name of assembly is .

trans-unit.source: -or- A method marked with <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComRegisterFunctionAttribute"></xref> is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -或-的方法标记为<xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComRegisterFunctionAttribute"></xref>不<xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: -or- There is more than one method marked with <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComRegisterFunctionAttribute"></xref> at a given level of the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: -或-没有标有多个方法<xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComRegisterFunctionAttribute"></xref>在给定级别的层次结构。

trans-unit.source: -or- The signature of the method marked with <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComRegisterFunctionAttribute"></xref> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: -或-方法的签名标有<xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComRegisterFunctionAttribute"></xref>无效。

trans-unit.source: Registers the specified type with COM using the specified GUID.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 GUID 的 COM 注册指定的类型。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to calling `CoRegisterClassObject` in COM.
trans-unit.target: 此方法等效于调用`CoRegisterClassObject`COM 中

trans-unit.source: The type to be registered for use from COM.
trans-unit.target: 要从 com。 用于注册的类型

trans-unit.source: GUID used to register the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 用于注册指定的类型的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified type is a COM type.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的类型是否为 COM 类型。

trans-unit.source: The type to determine if it is a COM type.
trans-unit.target: 要确定它是否为 COM 类型的类型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified type is a COM type; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的类型是 COM 类型;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified type requires registration.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的类型是否需要注册。

trans-unit.source: The type to check for COM registration requirements.
trans-unit.target: 要检查 COM 注册要求的类型。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the type must be registered for use from COM; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该类型必须注册以供从 COM;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Unregisters the classes in a managed assembly.
trans-unit.target: 注销托管程序集中的类。

trans-unit.source: `UnregisterAssembly` removes the registry entries for the types in the specified assembly previously added by <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IRegistrationServices.RegisterAssembly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `UnregisterAssembly`在指定的程序集之前添加的<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IRegistrationServices.RegisterAssembly%2A>.</xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IRegistrationServices.RegisterAssembly%2A>中移除的类型的注册表项

trans-unit.source: This method also calls any unregistration functions found in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 此方法还会调用程序集中找到的任何注销函数。

trans-unit.source: The assembly to be unregistered.
trans-unit.target: 要取消注册的程序集。

trans-unit.source: if assembly contains types that were successfully unregistered; otherwise if the assembly contains no eligible types.
trans-unit.target: 如果 assembly 包含已成功注销; 否则为类型如果该程序集包含不符合条件的类型。

trans-unit.source: assembly is .
trans-unit.target: assemblyis .

trans-unit.source: The full name of assembly is .
trans-unit.target: The full name of assembly is .

trans-unit.source: -or- A method marked with <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComUnregisterFunctionAttribute"></xref> is not <xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: -或-的方法标记为<xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComUnregisterFunctionAttribute"></xref>不<xref uid="langword_csharp_static" name="static" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: -or- There is more than one method marked with <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComUnregisterFunctionAttribute"></xref> at a given level of the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: -或-没有标有多个方法<xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComUnregisterFunctionAttribute"></xref>在给定级别的层次结构。

trans-unit.source: -or- The signature of the method marked with <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComUnregisterFunctionAttribute"></xref> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: -或-方法的签名标有<xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComUnregisterFunctionAttribute"></xref>无效。
